title: PRD ReDesign: Category Page

primary_persona.name: First-Time Visitor
characteristics: Male or female, depending on category
Has a specific symptom or category of interest
Looking for a clear explanation and trustworthy medical service
Wants to understand treatment options quickly
Needs confidence, safety, and clarity before starting a consultation
Has completed at least one consultation
Wants fast access to sub-categories and medical journeys
Expects a streamlined experience and consistent navigation
Wants to see certifications, privacy protection, and medical legitimacy
Responds strongly to credibility elements (reviews, medical USPs, etc.)

success_metrics: Increase funnel starts for each category
Reduce drop-off between category page → sub-category page
functional_overview: This page template must be generated automatically for any category created in the CMS. All content (titles, descriptions, images, sub-categories, metadata, USPs) must be pulled from the DB.

development_requirements.description: When a new category is created in the CMS, the system automatically generates a Category Page using this template. No developer involvement. Category fields include: name, hero image, description, SEO content, and sub-categories.
Display the global DoktorABC USPS bar at the top of the page. Same USP design used across site.
Show the global sticky navbar with Logo, Search, Account, Cart, and Menu. Behavior identical to production.
Show the global CRM coupon strip under the navbar. Content pulled from CRM.
Hero must display: Category hero image (from DB), Category name, Category description
Display the 4 fixed RX USPs for ALL category pages: Prescription issued online, Delivered in 1-2 days, Original German medicine, Advice via online questionnaire

Display a vertical or horizontal list of all sub-categories under the category. Each item includes: Sub-category name, Short description, Hero image (from DB), CTA button → navigates to sub-category page
Display the standard customer review component (same as homepage). Use same API and rotation logic as today.
Show row of accepted payment logos (PayPal, Visa, MasterCard, Klarna, etc.). SVG assets, responsive layout.
Show 'Your Privacy. Our Priority.' section with certifications (PCA, DMCA, LegitScript, etc.). Identical design as homepage.
Show the Press carousel with publication logos. Auto-rotating carousel.
Show the CRM email subscription block. Sends: User email, Category Page URL, Category name. Duplicate check + HubSpot lead creation.
Render the global site footer with localized links and legal text. Same as site-wide footer.
All text (title, descriptions, USPs, sub-category content) must be fully localized for DE + FR and must not break UI.
CMS must store: Category title, Category description, Category hero image (desktop + mobile), Sub-categories list (+ images + text), SEO content, Visibility toggles for components

page_flow: User arrives from homepage, search, funnel, or SEO landing.
Sees category hero → understands scope of treatments.
Scrolls to sub-categories → finds relevant medical path.
Reads trust components (USPs, reviews, privacy, press).
Optionally signs up via CRM block.
